definition: plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: A: I've come about your offer for bristles.
sentences.chinese: 我今天来访的目的是想听取你方对猪鬃的报盘。

sentences.english: You are requested to renew you offer for another couple of weeks.
sentences.chinese: 请将你方报盘再展期两星期。

sentences.english: We need not tell you that continuity of offers is very important.
sentences.chinese: 报盘的连续不断非常重要，自不待言。

sentences.english: All offers and sales are subject to the terms and conditions printed on the reverse side hereof.
sentences.chinese: 所有报盘和销售均应遵守本报价单背面所印的条款。

sentences.english: Please make us a fax offer.
If you decide to take advantage of our offer, kindly cable your acceptance.
sentences.chinese: 如果贵方决定接受我方的报盘，请以电传告之接受。

sentences.english: Taking the quality into consideration, we accept your offer.
sentences.chinese: 考虑到质量，我们接受你方报盘。

sentences.english: Here is our offer, 300 Euro per ton, CIF Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 我们的报盘，每吨300欧元新加坡到岸价。

sentences.english: You are cordificwisly invited to take regarding this cost effective offer.
sentences.chinese: 我们诚意约请你方利用好这个富有吸收力的报盘。

sentences.english: This offer is competitive and based on an expanding market..
sentences.chinese: 此报盘着眼于扩大销路而且很有竞争性。

sentences.english: This offer is firm, subject to your reply reaching us by the end of this month.
sentences.chinese: 此报盘为实盘，以你方在本月底前复到有效。

sentences.english: We’ll let you have the official offer next Monday.
sentences.chinese: 下星期就给您正式报盘。

sentences.english: We offer you subject to change without notice.
sentences.chinese: 我方向你方报盘，此报盘如有变化不另行通知。

sentences.english: We offer you subject to change without notice.
sentences.chinese: 我方向你方报盘，此报盘如有变化不另行通知。

sentences.english: We can not make any headway with your offer.
sentences.chinese: 你们的报盘未得任何进展。

definition: merchandise or commodities available immediately after sale/merchandise in stock/available item/actuals (investment)/actual commodities
to accept (i.e. acknowledge as calling for payment) (commerce)/to honor (a check, a promise)
property or cash held in reserve/stock
